duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate press brake machines, drill presses, and other machines to change the shape or condition of new materials.
Read and interpret work orders and apply them to the task at hand.
Perform machine setup and preventative maintenance as required.
Perform tasks such as grinding, drilling, sanding, tapping, and operation of press brake and punch.
Perform safety and quality checks. Work and adhere to all safety policies.
Understand and comprehend measurements. Read and interpret blueprints for special applications.
Operate in a manufacturing plant environment, perform repetitive tasks using hands, and have the ability to climb ladders and work in high places.

education_certification.credential: Basic math, tape measurement, and computer skills.
Understanding of blueprints for special applications.
Ability to set up machinery – press brake, shear, horizontal saw, plasma table, and punch turret.
Ability to work in a manufacturing plant environment.
Ability to lift up to 35 pounds and perform physical tasks.
Ability to climb ladders and work in high places.
